title: I taught them but they didn't learn (TEFC)
creator_credit: Ron Saunders, Sue Mogg, Malcolm Smith and South Australian Film Corporation
brief_description: Examines the attitudes which children from low socio-economic backgrounds bring to school. Teachers’ attitudes can affect children’s learning, so the attitudes of teachers are also examined. The intention of the film is to make teachers aware of the ‘culture gaps’ which can occur between groups of children.
